website_summaries.verdict: Make your own unique memorabilia snow globe with photos or artwork.
pros: With numerous uses for gift giving, these globes come with inserts to change out the base, or make your own
The insert for wallet-size photos can be seen from both sides, so you can use 2 back to back, or write on one side

customer_reviews.title: This is a great gift! Helpful hint - get your picture printed ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift! Helpful hint - get your picture printed as a wallet size for the best fit.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Harbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, nothing damaged..I really appreciate that :) its got a great weight to it, looks nice. Good value for the money. I love how you can put a picture in the globe and also on the base of it.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mom from my daughter for Grandparent's day. It's super customizable with the banner inserts and the fact that you can put 2 wallet sized pictures in it. It came with easy to follow directions. I like that it is plastic and not glass because it's much lighter weight and less fragil. I'm going to buy more to give out for the holidays. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JennyBoBenny

customer_reviews.title: Star drop for a careless mistake.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to give as a gift and the person (a tweenager) who loves snow globes really loved it. When I told her about how she can also change out the base designs using the ones in the box or she could create her own she tells me “there is NOTHING ELSE” in the box!!! WOW!!! Guess I’ll have to order WAAAY ahead of a persons special day to have time to inspect product and have enough to return it if need be! Sooo disappointing to know that they were not included when I ordered this in good faith according to their description of product and its inclusions. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Victoria N.

customer_reviews.title: They loved the different base options to go with the customization ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived packaged well. It was a gift for a Secret Santa at work. They loved the different base options to go with the customization of selecting the pic you want it to display. They did mention how there were no instructions to open the base so the factory pic can be removed and their own inserted. It was easy to help them but some may find that a challenge. Can't say if perhaps it was just missed in the one I ordered. Overall still great.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what genius thought it was a good idea to put this in a padded envelope. The base is ctacked and the box is thrashed. Was going to be a Christmas gift. The globe is this plastic and feels really cheap too. I wouldn't buy if I were you.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Vance

customer_reviews.title: A good present with many uses!
customer_reviews.text: This was honestly a really neat thing to buy, since you can choose what paper you put in the bottom and it comes with a white one you could even draw your own design if you wanted. Photos can be literally of anything so I made some neat presents using this, like putting the image of my friend's favorite videogame characters into a snowglobe.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son has been asking for a snow globe. This is made of durable plastic, if you push on it you can push in, but only if you push hard. It makes it more durable for kids. If dropped it doesn’t shatter like a glass now globe would. I like that I can change the base to whatever style I want. Pictures are easy to put in place. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristena Slates

customer_reviews.title: Blessing in disguise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it was glass, I didn’t fully read the description I suppose. It’s a heavy duty plastic, which actually is just what I needed. It’s going in my daughters room up on a shelf and I have a little peace knowing it won’t shatter everywhere if it was to fall. It’s easy to. Hangs out the paper decor at the base and is good quality. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: chasitybh

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, but won't last
customer_reviews.text: Adding your own photos to the globe is easy, and they are easily viewable. Unfortunately, the globe is cheap plastic, and won't last. If it was thicker plastic or glass, I'd be more comfortable with it, but it is just thin flexible plastic and won't stand up to much handling.
customer_reviews.author: J. Russo

customer_reviews.title: Great idea - beautiful snow globe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift idea. I love that it has interchangeable bands to match any décor and it is so easy to change those bands out and also put your pictures into the snow globe. Looks great and was exactly what I was hoping for. Will continue to use this time for additional gift ideas.
customer_reviews.author: J. Holden

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty tricky the first time I tried to change the photo in there. And some of the artificial snow pieces stick to the surface and won't come off. Other than that, it's really a nice option as gifts for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Shuai Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Such a great gift idea, pics were easy to make to fit for it, a little difficult to get the globe apart to add the pics but other than that great gift idea. Super cute, gave to 1 friend for secret santa, another friend when her sister passed away, I added photos of them with their family on 1 side and the other side their pet.
customer_reviews.author: Janice R

customer_reviews.title: Good gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is so customizable! You can choose from the inserts that it comes with or cut out your own! You can write a message on it too! It holds two photos, I took standard wallet sized ones and trimmed them down to size. Very easy to do, and makes a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This snowglobe was a pleasant surprise....it is plastic but heavy and looks and feels like glass!! It was the perfect gift for my sister, who collects them, and she absolutely loved it!! She had to hunt down pictures to put in it right then! :)
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnneC

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute and makes a really great and thoughtful gift. It didn’t leak or have any damage. You can insert 2 photos inside. The globe is plastic which is better than glass and is very durable. Worth it for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: ALS22

customer_reviews.title: I gave it to a friend for a wedding shower ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to a friend for a wedding shower. She can take out what I put in it and change the theme whenever she wants. It really is worth it if you want to give a unique and customized gift.
customer_reviews.author: KProuty

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my sister for Mother’s Day with pictures of my nieces on the inside! They all loved it. I like that it’s plastic because the girls love playing with it also. The only thing I didn’t like was the tiny screws on the bottom for the picture insertion. I spent the longest time trying to unscrew them before I figured out I could just pull it out.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Escalera

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a co-worker and was a little skeptical about the price vs quality. Surprisingly, this is a quality item for a cheap price. Doesn't look like it will fall apart immediately. You won't regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: kateisaredhead

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to use as Christmas gifts, and they worked out perfectly. Wallet size pictures fit perfectly inside, and they are very easy to insert. I also love that there are several options for the base design insert, or an option to make your own. These are not glass, they are pliable plastic globes which I actually like because they won't shatter if dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: We used it as a Christmas gift for grandparents because it's interchangeable year to year. I wouldn't call it solid enough to use a toy for a kid, but it's definitely good enough for a decoration that is occasionally picked up and turned over to see both sides.
customer_reviews.author: tfox

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Real fun to allow different photos from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: jessmull

customer_reviews.title: I feel scammed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know that the globe was plastic? The whole globe looks so cheap, it even came with an air bubble in the globe? The pictures also don't prop up unless you put something inside to hold it so it doesn't fall.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: It is a plastic one instead of glass one!! Look cheap n not value for money. If you change me $5, I definitely will buy it. $13? No! N The reason why I gave 2 stars is Bc it looks nice. But I am not really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taco

customer_reviews.title: Makes a nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute snow globe. It's not made of glass so it won't break. My mom loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift. (The bubble is flexible plastic FYI)
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother with pictures of my son in it. We made a custom insert for the base with his hand and foot prints on it. She LOVED it!!! Just be aware that the dome part is made from thin, flexible plastic. If you pick it up by the dome, it squishes a bit. I don't know what that means for durability long-term, but for us, it will do fine.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Great gift to give ♡
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to get this for his Grandma and insert family picture on one side and his individual picture on other. It was such a beautiful gift that she has it on her fireplace so everyone can see it♡
customer_reviews.author: amoonflower3

customer_reviews.title: Leaky!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three, two came perfect and one came leaking. Couldn’t find the source of the leak but you can tell there is a difference in amount of water from the leaking one to the other two. Still gave as a gift but told her to let me know if it keeps leaking. Disappointed that there is a 1 in 3 chance of your globe leaking!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienna Hecker

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I would like to give it a 3 star but the water leaked in the one we bought and I had to put plastic over the picture. The family photo that was already inside was soaked and it was super hard to get the paper off. Since it was so little space. The other one we purchased was fine! But still covered plastic around picture for protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This made a nice gift. Easy to put pictures inside. The globe is a softer plastic and I'm worried about it's durability.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good price and perfect for kids! The globe is flexible (as shown in picture) to where if dropped it will not shatter like glass would.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Its a gift for my step sister whos dog died recently. Its really cute n simple. I love it n gonna buy myself one too! When youre changing the pictures u really gotta pull tho, it wont break. Also i bought my wallet pics from Walgreens.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: A hit with young children
customer_reviews.text: My youngest grandchild (4yr) wanted a snow globe. This was an inexpensive introduction. Got each child (4-12 yr) one and they have enjoyed personalizing their globes with their picture choice. Fun addition to their bedroom desk areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They loved it!
customer_reviews.text: What an inexpensive lovely gift. Def use a wallet print
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made but cute
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to switch out the photos and colors but I didn’t expect the globe to be plastic instead of glass. Was disappointed with how cheaply made it is
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice gift. The picture gets magnified once it’s in the glove so it looks bigger. I’m disappointed that it’s plastic and not glass.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: Cute gift for those that are hard to buy for or for those who have everything.
customer_reviews.author: BC15

customer_reviews.title: Soft plastic
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize how simple it was. Obviously durable because it was rolling around in the box when it got to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Litton

customer_reviews.title: This snow globe makes a nice gift for a child or teen or married couple ...
customer_reviews.text: This snow globe makes a nice gift for a child or teen or married couple for a holiday gift. Nice choices of globe wrap paper, easy instructions to put in your photo....very nice. ---Mary in MT
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great snow globe. Love that it’s customizable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who was wanting a snow globe. I added a picture of me and him and one of his sister, him and I. He loved it
customer_reviews.author: christina aguilera

customer_reviews.title: great gift for good price
customer_reviews.text: this was a great gift. The person i gave it to loved it! The only thing is the "glass" part is this bendy plastic that seems not of good quality. So definitely not glass.
customer_reviews.author: Mak

customer_reviews.title: Snow globe moments
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My daughter's first novel (the loose ends list) featured a snow globe as a central symbol, so I used the bookmark inside instead of a photo. Worked fine!
customer_reviews.author: FME

customer_reviews.title: The granddaughters love
customer_reviews.text: It was a little tough to open, just add some pressure. The granddaughters love them
customer_reviews.author: Lori Bulis

customer_reviews.title: Really love it! Bought as a gift, I also want one
customer_reviews.text: Wow absolutely love love this item and it's not so small either you can put two photos I. With ease
customer_reviews.author: josh jones

customer_reviews.title: May need repair upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: The connection between the bubble and it's base came cracked and leaking. I was able to seal it with caulk, and then refill most of the water using an old liquid medicine syringe. A bit more DIY than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Comes fully assembled. Not a kit.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a kit that I could put together with my daughter. It came assembled. Directions are not very clear as to how to take apart and a bit tricky to do so, but it wasn’t bad. Overall great product but it’s advertised as a kit with items displayed that way.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Good for a childs gift not a collectable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3.5 yr son. He likes snow globes but I didn't want to pay a lot of money for something he may break. Changing out design paper and photos was easy. You get what you pay for.....and for me I am happy with product. It fitted what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: DMiller

customer_reviews.title: Such a great idea !!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for me and my 4 year old granddaughter to put her pictures in it for a Christmas gift to her Mommy. Its awsome. She can help put the pictures in, decide the color for the base and wrap it for Christmas for her Mommy!! Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: chris boer

customer_reviews.title: Best Valentine's Day Gift Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This brought tears to her eyes when all was said and done. This allows you to be creative or just stick with something traditional. I love how easy it was to put together and you can update it as time goes on. The durability is the best part of this snowglobe and helped make memories that'll last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Owen

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. Not sure how durable it will be. But cute.
customer_reviews.author: TinA

customer_reviews.title: It was really cute and easy to use but the picture size it needed was ...
customer_reviews.text: It was really cute and easy to use but the picture size it needed was too small to be printed anywhere. I couldn’t even find the dimensions. There was also some kind of liquid in the box when it arrived
customer_reviews.author: reganne

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Santa put money inside the picture area and the kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: NicholeJ

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son's teacher. I was really excited about the fact that it was customizable. However, when we received it, it did not have the inserts to be able to customize it and the box was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves snowglobes and what a fun gift to give someone when you can design it for them. We bought this as a gift for her uncle and she personalized it. They both loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew O. Ames

customer_reviews.title: I swear my package was used as a temporary soccer ball...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product but was very unsatisfied with the delivery because the package was all messed up and torn and looked like they kicked it all around. Thank god it didn’t contain actual glass or it would definitely be broken!! Wrap with more care next time!!
customer_reviews.author: cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Easy to assemble. It’s better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Wang

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Awesome concept. It's a bit flimsy and part of me wishes it was glass, but I definetly dont worry about it breaking. The "snow" inside temds to stick to the picture area and its rather difficult to get it unstuck. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: wish the globe was made of glass or a bit more solid and sturdy polymer instead of plastic
customer_reviews.text: Received the product on time. Works well. Although, wish the globe was made of glass or a bit more solid and sturdy polymer instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Snowglobe, love the different designs
customer_reviews.text: Great Snowglobe, love the different designs. Was much bigger than I expected. Very easy to get the pictures in and out of.

customer_reviews.title: SnowGlobe

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!!!

customer_reviews.title: Last all day long and then more hours the next day.
customer_reviews.text: This fantastic, I put it on and it lasts all day long and was still on the next day. I can't say that about many other lip products.

customer_reviews.text: Was a good concept & it would have been cute but it arrived broken & leaking.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!

product_meta.title: Neil Enterprises Create Your Own Photo Snow Globe
product_meta.description: Watch this video to see how to insert your own design: https://youtu.be/EBBsnR2aqbw How to insert your own base design: Turn the snow globe upside down Line up the black latches on the bottom over the small latch openings Pull out the black plastic Remove the existing base designs and insert your own Replace the black base and move the latches so it lock in place To insert your photo: Put one hand on the globe portion and one hand on the base Wiggle and pull the base until it loosens and comes apart Flip the globe upside down to insert your own photos Keep the clear sleeve inside the globe to hold your photos in place Replace the base squeeze together to secure Your snow globe is now ready to shake and display! This do-it-yourself snow globe is the ultimate personalized gift. Design your own base and slip in a favorite photo to create a completely custom, unique snow globe. To insert your own photo the base of the snow globe pulls off. If you're having trouble, try wiggling the base as you pull it. It is recommended that you leave the clear piece of plastic inside the globe to hold your photos in place.
feature_bullets: This create-a-globe is made out of durable plastic, not glass so it's kid friendly!
Holds two 2x3 photos, one on each side
Includes 4 pre-printed inserts for the snow globe base or you can create your own
The base pulls off to insert photos and there are little latches on the bottom to insert your own base design
Make your own snow globe by customizing the base with a photo, drawing, embroidery, monogram, or anything else you can think of!
